author: jleroux
msg: "Applied fix from trunk for revision: 985473"
Fix a bug reported by rrhati on user ML: Error message while adding to cart from ecommerce's promotion detail page
I get a error that "ERROR: No promotion found with ID [] " when I click on "add to cart" on the promotional items from the promotiondetail page. Have a look at the screenshots at
http://ofbiz.135035.n4.nabble.com/Error-message-while-adding-to-cart-from-ecommerce-s-promotion-detail-page-td2320794.html#a2321147

author: stefan2
msg: Reduce the average number of iterations required by svn_io_open_uniquely_named()
and reduce the runtime of each iteration.
Often, the initial temp. path suggested to the function is very generic one. If as a
result of a crash, other failure or simple parallel execution, many temporary files
share the same prefix causing the algorithm to take many iterations to find an unused
(prefix, iteration, suffix) combination. Just throw an additional random element in
there and we are usually good after the second iteration.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/io.c
(svn_io_open_uniquely_named): add a random element to the path once the first
test failed; don't call UTF8 conversion  unnecessarily
